short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to anonymize, overwrite and/or delete all your reddit comments and posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redust: Effortlessly Anonymize Your Reddit History

Take control of your Reddit footprint with Redust, the powerful browser extension that enables you to quickly and easily anonymize old comments and delete outdated posts. Whether you want to wipe the slate clean or simply cover your tracks, Redust is here to help!

Key Features:

* Mass Anonymize Comments: Efficiently edit multiple comments at once, replacing them with random phrases to protect your identity and maintain your privacy.
* Mass Delete Posts: Ready to move on? With Redust, you can automate the deletion of all your old Reddit posts that no longer reflect who you are, freeing you from past phases.
* User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a smooth and intuitive design that integrates seamlessly into your Reddit experience, making comment management a breeze.
* Performance Optimization: Designed with respect for Reddit's API rate limits, ensuring reliable operation without interruptions.

Why Choose Redust?
With Redust, you can reclaim your Reddit history like never before. Whether you're a casual user or a seasoned Redditor, our extension empowers you to mask or permanently remove years of potentially embarrassing comments and posts.

Notice:
All edits made with Redust will include a notice indicating that your comment was mass edited with the Redust browser extension, promoting transparency in your interactions.

Get Started:
Download Redust today and take the first step towards a cleaner, more anonymous Reddit experience!
